Title: Sound and Fury
Writer: Craig Johnson (book), Hunt Baldwin (developer), John Coveny (developer), Daniel C. Connolly
Actors: Robert Taylor, Katee Sackhoff, Lou Diamond Phillips, Bailey Chase
Plot: While serving at the Red Pony, Henry overhears a customer trying to organize a hit on his wife. When the customer leaves, Henry follows him to the car park to volunteer for the job.
